short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pangram Labs provides accurate detection of AI-written text. Highlight text, right click, and select 'Check for AI Content.'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pangram Labs has the most accurate AI detection model. Catch writing from ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and more with this extension.

ü¶äHow to use:
1. Click "Add to Chrome" and pin to the extensions bar. 
2. Create a Pangram account at https://www.pangramlabs.com/
3. Find your API key at https://www.pangramlabs.com/apikey. Click on the Pangram extension icon, enter your API key and click Save.
3. On a new page, highlight the text you want to check and right-click to ‚ÄòCheck for AI content.‚Äô
4. The result will pop up in the bottom right corner of the page.
5. You can also change the visibility of the floating icon by clicking the Pangram extension icon in the upper right and toggling "Show Floating Icon."

‚ùìHow it works:
This chrome plugin is powered by the AI-generated classifier from Pangram Labs. 
Pangram's text classifier is trained on millions of AI-generated documents and can identify AI writing from its distinct style.

üìäHelp us improve:
Have an issue using this plugin? Want to request more features? Want to learn more about the details? Contact us: https://www.pangramlabs.com/contact-us
